response.overview: In the near future, a young boy is raised in a laboratory by an artificial intelligence program that he believes to be his mother. He lives in complete ignorance of the outside world and under the AI's strict control for over 20 years but then everything changes when a woman is introduced into the experiment. The two find themselves at odds with each other but quickly realize they must work together if they want to find a means of escape.
response.title: Project Alexander
